description: SnapToRoads matches GPS trace to roads most likely traveled on.

parameters.name: SnappedGeometryFormat
parameters.description: Chooses what the returned SnappedGeometry format should be. Default Value: FlexiblePolyline.

parameters.name: SnapRadius
parameters.description: The radius around the provided tracepoint that is considered for snapping. Unit: meters Default value: 300

parameters.name: TracePoints
parameters.description: List of trace points to be snapped onto the road network. (dict) --- TracePoint indices for which the provided notice code corresponds to. Heading (float) --- GPS Heading at the position. Position defined as [longitude, latitude]. (float) --- Speed (float) --- Speed at the specified trace point . Unit: KilometersPerHour Timestamp (string) --- Timestamp of the event.

nested_params.name: Speed
nested_params.description: Speed at the specified trace point .

parameters.name: TravelMode
parameters.description: Specifies the mode of transport when calculating a route. Used in estimating the speed of travel and road compatibility. Default Value: Car.

parameters.name: TravelModeOptions
parameters.description: Travel mode related options for the provided travel mode. Truck (dict) --- Travel mode options when the provided travel mode is 'Truck'. GrossWeight (integer) --- Gross weight of the vehicle including trailers, and goods at capacity. Unit: Kilograms HazardousCargos (list) --- List of Hazardous cargos contained in the vehicle. (string) --- Height (integer) --- Height of the vehicle. Unit: centimeters Length (integer) --- Length of the vehicle. Unit: centimeters Trailer (dict) --- Trailer options corresponding to the vehicle. TrailerCount (integer) --- Number of trailers attached to the vehicle. Default Value: 0 TunnelRestrictionCode (string) --- The tunnel restriction code. Tunnel categories in this list indicate the restrictions which apply to certain tunnels in Great Britain. They relate to the types of dangerous goods that can be transported through them. Tunnel Category B Risk Level: Limited risk Restrictions: Few restrictions Tunnel Category C Risk Level: Medium risk Restrictions: Some restrictions Tunnel Category D Risk Level: High risk Restrictions: Many restrictions occur Tunnel Category E Risk Level: Very high risk Restrictions: Restricted tunnel Width (integer) --- Width of the vehicle in centimenters.

nested_params.name: Truck
nested_params.description: Travel mode options when the provided travel mode is 'Truck'.

nested_params.name: GrossWeight
nested_params.description: Gross weight of the vehicle including trailers, and goods at capacity.

nested_params.name: HazardousCargos
nested_params.description: List of Hazardous cargos contained in the vehicle.

nested_params.name: Trailer
nested_params.description: Trailer options corresponding to the vehicle.

nested_params.name: TrailerCount
nested_params.description: Number of trailers attached to the vehicle. Default Value: 0

nested_params.name: TunnelRestrictionCode
nested_params.description: The tunnel restriction code. Tunnel categories in this list indicate the restrictions which apply to certain tunnels in Great Britain. They relate to the types of dangerous goods that can be transported through them.

nested_params.name: Width
nested_params.description: Width of the vehicle in centimenters.

nested_items.name: Notices
nested_items.description: Notices are additional information returned that indicate issues that occurred during route calculation.

nested_items.name: TracePointIndexes
nested_items.description: TracePoint indices for which the provided notice code corresponds to.

nested_items.name: PricingBucket
nested_items.description: The pricing bucket for which the query is charged at.

nested_items.name: SnappedGeometry
nested_items.description: The interpolated geometry for the snapped route onto the road network.

nested_items.name: LineString
nested_items.description: An ordered list of positions used to plot a route on a map.

nested_items.name: Polyline
nested_items.description: An ordered list of positions used to plot a route on a map in a lossy compression format.

nested_items.name: SnappedGeometryFormat
nested_items.description: Specifies the format of the geometry returned for each leg of the route.

nested_items.name: SnappedTracePoints
nested_items.description: The trace points snapped onto the road network.

nested_items.name: Confidence
nested_items.description: Confidence value for the correctness of this point match.

nested_items.name: OriginalPosition
nested_items.description: Position of the TracePoint provided within the request, at the same index.

nested_items.name: SnappedPosition
nested_items.description: Snapped position of the TracePoint provided within the request, at the same index.
